backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, storage mixins, and system config primitives with initialization guards.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a PNG asset generation requirement with linked files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files detailing routing, components, hooks, and UI behaviors.
frontend/dist/.ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration specifying cache policies, MIME types, fallback behavior, and security settings for deployed frontend files.
frontend/dist/index.html: Built production HTML with SEO metadata, structured data, social tags, PWA config, and links to generated assets.
frontend/index.html: Source HTML template containing SEO metadata, structured data, and PWA settings for the Vite React frontend.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists the canonical domains for the Internet Computer canister deployment.
frontend/public/generated/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the generated asset directory remains version-controlled.
frontend/public/generated/GENERATION_GUI: Detailed design and specification guide outlining required styles and dimensions for 57 PNG assets used in the app.
frontend/public/generated/STYLE-GUIDE.tx: Design style guide detailing colors, typography, visual elements, asset rules, and accessibility for the EcoPowerHub AI brand.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA configuration defining app metadata, icons, shortcuts, display settings, and language options.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots directives allowing general crawling while blocking specific routes and declaring the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and mixed caching strategies for navigation, assets, and scripts.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing all public site URLs with metadata such as last-modified dates, priorities, and language alternates.
frontend/restore-assets.js: Node script that ensures required PNG assets exist in the generated folder with validation of filenames and dimensions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, query client, layout wrappers, and authenticated page structure.
frontend/src/components/affiliate/SolarG: Affiliate section listing multiple solar generator brands with product details, images, benefits, and tracking IDs.
frontend/src/components/affiliate/Tracki: Widget that displays an affiliate tracking ID and copies it to clipboard with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/AlarmNotificatio: UI component showing a morning alarm-style notification with weather, energy data, sound playback, and dismiss controls.
frontend/src/components/AraChat.tsx: Floating chat widget that handles user messages, auto-scroll, and generates random assistant replies.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddAla: Dialog for creating a new alarm, capturing time and settings, then submitting via mutation with user identity.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddSys: Dialog for adding an energy system, including region detection, device filtering, and submitting system configuration.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Alarms: Displays and manages user alarms with add, edit, toggle, and delete functionality using backend queries.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Analyt: Shows energy analytics with charts, predictive data, deployment status checks, and downloadable reports.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EditAl: Form dialog for editing an existing alarm’s time and settings and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Energy: Renders a dual‑axis line chart of energy consumption and temperature over time.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EVAuth: Dialog for connecting EV accounts via a mock OAuth flow and saving auth configs.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Mainte: Displays a mock maintenance dashboard with system health, events, learning updates, and configuration preview.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/MyEVCa: Displays EV status and controls, showing telemetry, battery info, and a mock solar charging action with disconnect support.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Fetches system and energy data to display usage statistics, charts, status cards, and onboarding messages.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Recomm: Shows AI-generated energy recommendations filtered by user language, with loading states and summary alerts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/System: Manages connected systems and EV integrations, providing dialogs to add systems or authenticate EV providers.
Renders cards for each system showing latest energy and temperature data or a prompt when no systems exist.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Temper: Renders a bar chart of temperatures per location with optional Celsius/Fahrenheit conversion.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Smar: Displays mock diagnostic results and information about the upcoming smart diagnostics feature.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright, branding, and external links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main app header with logo, user greeting, theme toggle, logout, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/LoadingErrorBoun: Wrapper that displays loading, timeout, or error states with retry and online/offline detection.
Marketing site footer with brand section, navigation links, legal links, and social icons.
Marketing header with logo, navigation, theme toggle, and region/language selectors with persistence.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects user name and preferred language, auto-detects browser settings, and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/StableImage.tsx: Image component that stabilizes dimensions, handles load/error states, and swaps to a fallback image when needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, managing login/logout, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, admin checks, and placeholder system config queries using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, and utility classes including grid and image helpers.
frontend/src/lib/alarmService.ts: Provides alarm-related utilities including motivational messages, voice prompts, alarm sound playback, and speech synthesis updates.
frontend/src/lib/assetRestoration.ts: Lists required PNG assets with metadata for build-time validation of existence, format, and dimensions.
frontend/src/lib/assetVerification.ts: Defines asset categories and a full list of required generated assets for runtime verification via HTTP HEAD checks.
frontend/src/lib/generatedAssetPaths.ts: Centralizes string constants for all generated PNG asset paths used across the app.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Provides supported languages, regions, device/system metadata, RTL helpers, temperature utilities, and timezone formatting.
frontend/src/lib/weather.ts: Implements Open‑Meteo API fetch logic, weather code mapping, forecast parsing, and browser geolocation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BestPracticesPage.tsx: Renders a best‑practices guide page with maintenance tips using cards, accordions, and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceSecurityPag: Displays compliance and security content with print‑mode styling and a PDF/print generation flow.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with tab navigation, user greeting, and admin shortcuts for domains, email automation, and deployment status.
Checks accessibility and SSL status of configured domains and displays deployment readiness with copy-to-clipboard helpers.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceIntegrationGuid: Shows detailed integration guides for supported energy devices, including setup steps, troubleshooting, and benefits.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Diagnostics hub offering regional electrical system info, searchable documentation, and a smart diagnostics panel.
frontend/src/pages/DomainPortfolioPage.t: Presents mock domain portfolio data with availability, pricing, and strategy recommendations for brand protection.
frontend/src/pages/EmailAutomationPage.t: Renders an interface for managing automated email replies based on predefined rule keywords and responses. Includes UI controls, rule listings, and clipboard notifications.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with a hero section, CTA, and device setup guide cards. Uses background assets and styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity with auto-redirect on successful authentication. Includes feature highlights and styled UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingCampaignAsse: Shows downloadable marketing assets, ad scripts, and banner variants with clipboard copy functionality. Organized using tabs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerMarketplacePag: Lists affiliate programs with details, images, and benefits for the partner marketplace. Uses cards and generated assets for visual display.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page with sections explaining data collection, usage, and security. Static content with headings, paragraphs, and lists.
frontend/src/pages/SupportIntegrationsPa: Fetches and displays manufacturer support and support boundary data with loading/error handling. Shows support details using cards and a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/TechSpecsPage.tsx: Displays technical specs including voltage compatibility, device specs, compliance standards, and SCADA protocol support. Uses various UI components and static spec arrays.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for system configs, energy data, pricing, SCADA support, EV data, and other shared frontend types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite-build-verify.js: Checks that required PNG assets exist in build output and verifies index.html and asset directories.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, image requirements, and feature definitions for generating a specific PNG logo slice.
